full_sentence: What the author emphasized is that us Pakistanis staying in a western nation should try to assimilate with the local culture, cause in most cases we don't. He shouldn't have said that.
This is fucking 2020: let the foreigners do the cleaning, this is denmark, stop sending danish to do the dirty work.

full_sentence: First time I saw this movie was when I rented it from Hollywood Video for my 9th birthday. Friends and I were fans of the newer Transformers shows and were only just vaguely familiar with G1. Don't know why the movie needed a woman though, it's an action movie after all.

topics.sentence_slice: First time I saw this movie
don't know why the movie needed a woman
